source.name: USGS Volcano Notification Service (VNS)
source.description: Website provides a subscription service to receive an email when changes occur in the activity levels for monitored U.S. volcanoes and/or when information releases are sent out.  Updates and releases happen either daily, weekly, or monthly or when activity at a volcano increases or decreases.  Users are able to select regions, volcanoes, or alert levels as filters.
